game_description: Familiar to play, yet challenging to master, Candy Puzzle brings fresh mind-bending challenges and unanticipated obstacles to the casual phenomenon loved by everyone! Keep your brain fit and boost your problem-solving skills by mastering the tricky levels based on real-life physics. Tired of mind game? Just sit/stand back and enjoy the cheerful and relaxing game atmosphere of one of the most beautiful game for everyone. === Features === - Easy to challenging levels - 50+ levels in full version - Amazing relaxing music and environment - 90Hz support Note : We will add more levels in future updates
review_1: I like the game. It´s like a Cut the Rope wanna be, but with a dog and VR sticks. Cool to play for a while, but annoying after a time because it repetitive. Specially the sounds and music that repeat all over. The dog´s crying is boring.
review_2: I liked the atmosphere, music, and gameplay. Really nice stress-release game. Liked the puzzle as easy to challenging.
